results.title: A Novel THRbeta Variant in a Child With Resistance to Thyroid Hormone beta: Diagnostic and Therapeutic Challenges.
results.text_hl: Clinical and biochemical findings were consistent with @<m>DISEASE_Thyroid_Hormone_Resistance_Syndrome</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D018382 @@@RTHbeta@@@. @<m>CHEMICAL_Atenolol</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D001262 @@@Atenolol@@@ therapy was initiated to manage @DISEASE_Tachycardia @DISEASE_MESH:D013610 @@@tachycardia@@@ with favorable response.This case highlights the potential for misdiagnosis of @<m>DISEASE_Thyroid_Hormone_Resistance_Syndrome</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D018382 @@@RTHbeta@@@ as TSHoma and underscores the value of genetic testing in differentiating the two.

citations.NLM: Gürpınar G, Aracı DG. A Novel THRbeta Variant in a Child With Resistance to Thyroid Hormone beta: Diagnostic and Therapeutic Challenges. J Clin Res Pediatr Endocrinol. 2025 Sep 17;():. PMID: 40960072
